Extensions/JSONSerialization.html#/s:10F.name: jsonObject(with:options:)
Extensions/JSONSerialization.html#/s:10F.abstract: Attempts to derive a Foundation object from a ByteBuffer and return it as T.

Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.name: encode(_:into:)
Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Writes a JSON-encoded representation of the value you supply into the supplied ByteBuffer.

Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.name: encodeAsByteBuffer(_:allocator:)
Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Writes a JSON-encoded representation of the value you supply into a ByteBuffer that is freshly allocated.

Extensions/JSONDecoder.html#/s:10Foundat.name: decode(_:from:)
Extensions/JSONDecoder.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Returns a value of the type you specify, decoded from a JSON object inside the readable bytes of a ByteBuffer.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: init(buffer:byteTransferStrategy:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Creates a Data from a given ByteBuffer. The entire readable portion of the buffer will be read.

Extensions/ByteBufferAllocator.html#/s:7.name: buffer(data:)
Extensions/ByteBufferAllocator.html#/s:7.abstract: Create a fresh ByteBuffer containing the bytes contained in the given Data.

Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.name: noCopy
Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.abstract: Do not copy the bytes if at all possible.

Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.name: automatic
Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.abstract: Use a heuristic to decide whether to copy the bytes or not.

Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.name: ByteTransferStrategy
Extensions/ByteBuffer/ByteTransferStrate.abstract: Controls how bytes are transferred between ByteBuffer and other storage types.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: readData(length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Read length bytes off this ByteBuffer, move the reader index forward by length bytes and return the result

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: readData(length:byteTransferStrategy:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Read length bytes off this ByteBuffer, move the reader index forward by length bytes and return the result

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: getData(at:length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Return length bytes starting at index and return the result as Data. This will not change the reader index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: getData(at:length:byteTransferStrategy:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Return length bytes starting at index and return the result as Data. This will not change the reader index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: getString(at:length:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Get a String decoding length bytes starting at index with encoding. This will not change the reader index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: readString(length:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Read a String decoding length bytes with encoding from the readerIndex, moving the readerIndex appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: writeString(_:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write string into this ByteBuffer using the encoding encoding, moving the writer index forward appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: setString(_:encoding:at:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write string into this ByteBuffer at index using the encoding encoding. Does not move the writer index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: writeContiguousBytes(_:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write bytes into this ByteBuffer at the writer index, moving the writer index forward appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: setContiguousBytes(_:at:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write bytes into this ByteBuffer at index. Does not move the writer index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: writeData(_:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write the bytes of data into this ByteBuffer at the writer index, moving the writer index forward appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: setData(_:at:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Write the bytes of data into this ByteBuffer at index. Does not move the writer index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: getJSONDecodable(_:decoder:at:length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Attempts to decode the length bytes from index using the JSONDecoder decoder as T.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: readJSONDecodable(_:decoder:length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Reads length bytes from this ByteBuffer and then attempts to decode them using the JSONDecoder decoder.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: setJSONEncodable(_:encoder:at:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Encodes value using the JSONEncoder encoder and set the resulting bytes into this ByteBuffer at the

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.name: writeJSONEncodable(_:encoder:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:7NIOCore10.abstract: Encodes value using the JSONEncoder encoder and writes the resulting bytes into this ByteBuffer.

Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html#/s:.name: failedToEncodeString
Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html#/s:.abstract: Attempting to encode the given string failed.

Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html.name: ByteBufferFoundationError
Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html.abstract: Errors that may be thrown by ByteBuffer methods that call into Foundation.
